seo: 灵当CRM,uploadfile,文件上传漏洞,远程代码执行,安全检测
seo_en: Lingdang CRM,uploadfile,file upload vulnerability,remote code execution,security detection
summary: 该插件用于检测灵当CRM系统中uploadfile接口的任意文件上传漏洞，攻击者可能利用此漏洞上传恶意文件，进而实现远程代码执行或其他攻击行为。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the arbitrary file upload vulnerability in the uploadfile interface of Lingdang CRM. Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to upload malicious files, leading to remote code execution or other attack behaviors.
